title: Three Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
directions: Cut the stem out of the mushroom to prepare it for stuffing. I first chop off the stem, and then make a circular cut around the area where the stem was. Continue to cut until you have removed excess mushroom.
Place the cream cheese in the microwave for 15 seconds to soften.
Combine the cream cheese, all of the shredded cheeses, salt, pepper, and Worcesteshire sauce in a medium bowl. Stir to combine.
Stuff the mushrooms with the cheese mixture.
Place the mushrooms in the Air Fryer for 8 minutes on 370 degrees.
Allow the mushrooms to cool before serving.
ingredients: 8 oz large fresh mushrooms I used Monterrery
4 oz cream cheese I used reduced-fat
